when "0000" => correction_term <= "0000000000000000000000000000000";
when "0001" => correction_term <= "0000000000000000000000000000000";

when "1111" => correction_term <= "0000000000000000000000000000000";
when others => correction_term <= "0000000000000000000000000000000";
